#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    long long num = 1,den = 1;
    long long n,m;
    while(t--)
    {
      num = 1;den = 1;
      scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&m);
      for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)
      {
          num = (num+den)%m;
          den = (num+den)%m;
      }
      printf("%lld/%lld\n",num,den);
    }
    return 0;
}
